changeSet.author: kascice
changeSet.comment: Need to have at least one changeset to allow tagging to work.

changeSet.author: prakasht
changeSet.comment: create new table to support modality description feature

changeSet.author: prakasht
changeSet.comment: insert modality description from DICOM standard - ftp://medical.nema.org/medical/dicom/2009/09_03pu3.pdf - section C.7.3.1.1.1 Modality

changeSet.author: panq
panq
changeSet.comment: create new table and related constrain to support MR modality search feature
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE MR_IMAGE ( IMAGE_TYPE_VALUE_3 VARCHAR2(16 CHAR) NOT NULL, SCANNING_SEQUENCE VARCHAR2(126 CHAR) NOT NULL, SEQUENCE_VARIANT VARCHAR2(126 CHAR) NOT NULL, REPETITION_TIME FLOAT(126), ECHO_TIME FLOAT(126), INVERSION_TIME FLOAT(126), SEQUENCE_NAME VARCHAR2(64 CHAR), IMAGED_NUCLEUS VARCHAR2(64 CHAR), MAGNETIC_FIELD_STRENGTH FLOAT(126), SAR FLOAT(126), DB_DT FLOAT(126), TRIGGER_TIME FLOAT(126), ANGIO_FLAG VARCHAR2(1 CHAR), IMAGE_PK_ID NUMBER(24) NOT NULL, MR_IMAGE_PK_ID NUMBER(24) primary key, GENERAL_SERIES_PK_ID NUMBER(24) ); ALTER TABLE MR_IMAGE ADD ( CONSTRAINT FK_MR_GEN_IMAGE_PK_ID FOREIGN KEY (IMAGE_PK_ID) REFERENCES GENERAL_IMAGE (IMAGE_PK_ID), CONSTRAINT FK_MR_GEN_SERIES_PK_ID FOREIGN KEY (GENERAL_SERIES_PK_ID) REFERENCES GENERAL_SERIES (GENERAL_SERIES_PK_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE);

changeSet.author: panq
changeSet.comment: Creat function based index for submission timestamp
changeSet.sql: create index timestamp_func_idx on submission_history to_date(trunc(submission_timestamp, 'DDD'));

changeSet.author: panq
changeSet.comment: Creat index for study instance UID in general_series table

changeSet.author: gustafss
changeSet.comment: create new table to support workflow
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE WORKFLOW ( WORKFLOW_ID NUMBER(24) primary key, NAME VARCHAR2(50) NULL , COLLECTION VARCHAR2(200) NULL , SITE VARCHAR2(200) NULL , URL VARCHAR2(255) NULL , WORKFLOW_TYPE VARCHAR2(50) NULL )

changeSet.author: panq
panq
changeSet.comment: Database upgrade for CSM/UPT 5.1 -- part II
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER SET_CSM_PASSWORD_HISTORY BEFORE INSERT ON CSM_PASSWORD_HISTORY FOR EACH ROW BEGIN SELECT CSM_PASSWORD_HISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.CSM_PASSWORD_HISTORY_ID FROM DUAL; END;

changeSet.author: panq
changeSet.comment: Database upgrade for CSM/UPT 5.1 -- part III
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE CSM_USER MODIFY(ORGANIZATION VARCHAR2(500 CHAR));

changeSet.author: panq
changeSet.comment: Create function based index for project//site concatenation

changeSet.author: prasaiyk
prasaiyk
prasaiyk
prasaiyk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE csm_user SET PASSWORD_EXPIRY_DATE=sysdate + 60 WHERE login_name='prasaiyk'
